::Dollen::

He gets out of StarScream. Within a few seconds he hates the antarctic.
He walks up to Killfest's group.
"Guys, we have a problem. As we flew over, I saw what looked like
Tankorr heading are way. He was probably carrying a strike force of
troops too."
